title: Pay Back
description: Being auctioned off like a piece of meat was not high on Joseph Camenitti's bucket list, meeting a mystery woman from his past, that he could like, a lot.Evie Tolland had spent WAY too long thinking of herself as the ugly duckling and that was going to change immediately.He's all caveman, she's an old fashioned girl. Something's gotta give!
author: L.C. Giroux
